intro:
Welcome to Dashboard Airdrop Bot

Decentralised Finance is a world changing innovation In the last 90 days it has seen a growth rate of over 1,200% and is on track to bring in another $60Bn over the next two years We truly believe it will change the world However, its future is in jeopardy Ethereum is congested and has become a whales only playground due to soaring transaction fees

Welcome to Dashboard Airdrop Bot

Decentralised Finance is a world changing innovation In the last 90 days it has seen a growth rate of over 1,200% and is on track to bring in another $60Bn over the next two years We truly believe it will change the world However, its future is in jeopardy Ethereum is congested and has become a whales only playground due to soaring transaction fees
